deprecated_yaml.title: The {integration_title} YAML configuration will be deprecated
deprecated_yaml.description: The {integration_title} has been automatically migrated, please remove the YAML from configuration.yaml.

deprecated_yaml_import_issue_cannot_conn.title: The {integration_title} YAML configuration import cannot connect to the Russound device
deprecated_yaml_import_issue_cannot_conn.description:
Configuring {integration_title} using YAML is being removed but there was a connection error importing your YAML configuration.

Please make sure {integration_title} is turned on, and restart Home Assistant to try importing again. Otherwise, please remove the YAML from your configuration and add the integration manually.

deprecated_yaml_import_issue_no_primary_.title: The {integration_title} YAML configuration import cannot configure the Russound Device.
deprecated_yaml_import_issue_no_primary_.description:
Configuring {integration_title} using YAML is being removed but there was a connection error importing your YAML configuration.

No primary controller was detected for the Russound device. Please make sure that the target Russound device has it's controller ID set to 1 (using the selector on the back of the unit).

deprecated_yaml_import_issue_unknown.title: The {integration_title} YAML configuration could not be imported
deprecated_yaml_import_issue_unknown.description:
Configuring {integration_title} using YAML is being removed but there was an unknown error importing your YAML configuration.

Please make sure {integration_title} is turned on, and restart Home Assistant to try importing again. Otherwise, please remove the YAML from your configuration and add the integration manually.
